text: ymjjid allah nafsah wayuezim shanh, liqudratih ealaa ma la yaqdir ealayh 'ahad swah, la 'ilh ghyrh, wala rabi swah, fahu aldhy 'asraa bieabdih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam zmnana min allayl bjsdh wrwhh, yqzt la mnamana, min almasjid alharam b "mk" 'iilaa almasjid al'aqsaa b "byt almqds" aldhy barak allah hawlah fi alzrwe walthmar waghayr dhlk, wjelh mhla lkthyr min alanbya'; lyshahd eajayib qudrat allah wa'adilat whdanyth. 'iina allah subhanah wteala hu alsamie lajamie alaswat, albasir bikuli mubsar, fyety kula ma ysthqh fi aldunya walakhrt
